name: Clone Airbnb
subtitle: Polly Pocket's page on Airbnb
description: A clone website of the leading home rental brand for accommodations: Airbnb. The site was cloned for educational purposes, focusing on HTML and CSS, particularly the Grid Layout.

name: Organizarty OnePage
subtitle: Organizarty's OnePage site
description: A one-page website for my fictional party-hiring company, Organizarty. It was created as part of my final project for the third year of my technical system development course, integrated with my high school studies. The website features creative elements like the parallax effect, side-scrolling models, and animations.

name: SAVE Project
subtitle: SAVE Project website
description: The SAVE project was born to meet a challenge presented by Oceans20, a community engagement group. Oceans20 tasked my team and me with contributing innovative technological and creative solutions to help prevent water pollution. This project also wins the Global Solution premiation in FIAP

name: My Portfolio
subtitle: My Portfolio web page
description: Well... This site is a portfolio too, isn't it?

name: FormulaBet
subtitle: FormulaBet bet Page
description: Mahindra has tasked me and my partners with an exciting mission: to boost the popularity of Formula E and bring it into the spotlight, much like Formula 1. Our solution is FormulaBet, a dynamic web-based betting platform that integrates everything a Formula E fan needs in one place. Not only does it allow users to place bets, but it also offers up-to-date news, profiles on drivers, and insider insightsâ€”empowering fans to make informed decisions.
